thread.title: Delhi government scraps BRT corridor system
thread.title_full: Delhi government scraps BRT corridor system

author: IANS
title: Delhi government scraps BRT corridor system
text: Moneylife Â» Delhi government scraps BRT corridor system 42864 Delhi government scraps BRT corridor system 0 Comments, Be the first to comment + COMMENT IANS | 21/07/2015 06:06 PM | The AAP-run Delhi government on Tuesday decided to scrap Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) corridor system introduced by Shiela Dikshit-led Congress government in the city. "The decision to scrap BRT was taken in a meeting chaired by Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal," said Delhi Law Minister Kapil Mishra of the Aam Aadmi Party. Dikshit-led Congress government had opened the BRT corridor in Delhi on April 20, 2008. This move was welcomed by environmentalists and several transport experts as a solution to Delhi's traffic woes that would promote public transport. More in Moneylife
